mapper.select: SELECT J.JRN_CODE, J.LINE_NO, J.JRN_NO, J.JRN_DATE, J.ACCT_CODE, A.ACCT_NAME, -- 계정명 J.DC_TYPE, J.AMOUNT, J.REMARKS, J.STATUS, J.CREATED_AT, J.CREATED_BY, J.CUS_CODE, C.CUS_NAME, -- 거래처명 J.CLOSE_NO FROM JOURNAL J LEFT JOIN ACCOUNT A ON J.ACCT_CODE = A.ACCT_CODE LEFT JOIN CUSTOMER C ON J.CUS_CODE = C.CUS_CODE WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC, LINE_NO ASC
